Task: Make a Bead Ring

Steps:
1. Cut a strip of elastic.
2. Slip two larger beads on either side of the small bead.
3. Slip a small bead on one tail.
4. Continue this pattern until you have enough beads to fit around the finger.
5. Finish the ring by slipping the loose tails through the first small bead you placed on the elastic.

Descriptions:

      :parameters (?p - player ?elastic - elastic ?strip - strip)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?elastic))

      :parameters (?p - player ?strip - strip ?bead1 - bead ?bead2 - bead ?small_bead - bead)
